member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Defaults.OnAfterGetTableList(Integer,List of [Integer]@)
member.summary: Enables adding and removing tables from the default initial setup for tables to search.
member.param: Page ID for the selected role center
List of integer. Already filled with standard tables.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Events.OnGetFieldNoForTableType(Integer,Integer@)
member.summary: Specifies the Field No. for the table type field. For example "Sales Header" would specify 1 = "Document Type"
member.param: The table no. of the table that is being searched.
The field no. of the 'document type' field.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Events.OnGetParentTable(Integer,Integer@)
member.summary: Specifies the parent table if a table is a sub-table in a header/lines construct, such as Sales Line
member.param: The table no. of the table that is being searched.
If the the table is a sub-table, please specify the parent table here

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Events.OnGetSubTable(Integer,Integer@)
member.summary: Specifies the sub table if a table is a parent table in a header/lines construct, such as Sales Line / Sales Header
member.param: The table no. of the table that is being searched.
If the the table is a parent table, please specify the sub table here

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Events.OnGetListPageNo(Integer,Integer,Integer@)
member.summary: Specifies the list page no. to be used for displaying the record. Only needed if the page is not the standard list/card page for the table
member.param: The table no. of the table that is being displayed.
If the table as a 'Document Type'-like field, this value specifies the type as integer.
The page to use to display the record.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Events.OnGetCardPageNo(Integer,Integer,Integer@)
member.summary: Specifies the card page no. to be used for displaying the record. If no card exists, then specify the list page no. Only needed if the page is not the standard list/card page for the table
member.param: The table no. of the table that is being displayed.
If the table as a 'Document Type'-like field, this value specifies the type as integer.
The page to use to display the record.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Events.OnMapLineRecToHeaderRec(RecordRef@,RecordRef@)
member.summary: Specifies the header RecordRef to a corresponding line RecordRef for e.g. sales line -> sales header
member.param: The line record
The parent of the line record

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Events.OnAfterGetRolecCenterTableList(Integer,List of [Integer]@)
member.summary: Enables adding and removing tables from the default initial setup for tables to search.
member.param: Page ID for the selected role center
List of integer. Already filled with standard tables.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Events.OnAfterGetFieldListForTable(Integer,List of [Integer]@)
member.summary: Enables adding and removing tables from the default initial setup for tables to search.
member.param: The table no. of the table that is being set up.
List of integer. You can specifify additional fields for a table here or remove unwanted.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Events.OnGetExcludedRelatedTableField(Integer,Boolean@)
member.summary: Specifies whether a field is excluded from the default fields in a table, based on its table relation. Typically we would exclude fields from search that have relations to posting groups, reason codes, etc.
member.param: The table no. that the field has relation to.
true/false whether the field should be excluded from the default setup.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Events.OnGetTableSubTypeFromPage(Integer,Integer@)
member.summary: Specifies the table subtype for a page. Typically this means 'document type' for a specific table that is source table for the page.
member.param: The page no. that we want to get the subtype ('document type') for.
Integer. The value of the subtype/document type.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Events.OnBeforeSearchTable(RecordRef@)
member.summary: Allows the addition of additional filters for the specified during the search.
member.param: The record on which the search is being conducted.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Events.OnBeforeSearchTableProcedure(Integer,Integer,List of [Integer]@,List of [Text]@,Dictionary of [Text,Text]@,Boolean@)
member.summary: Allows the different implementation of the SerachTable procedure.
member.param: The table no. of the table that is being displayed.
If the table as a 'Document Type'-like field, this value specifies the type as integer.
List of integer. You can specifify additional fields for a table here or remove unwanted.
List of Text.
Dictionary of Text/Text values.
Defines should system stop processing code in the procedure SearchTable.

member.name: M:Table::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Setup (Table).InsertRec(Boolean)
member.summary: Used for also inserting related records, e.g. for SalesHeader that has several subtypes

member.name: M:Table::Microsoft#Foundation#DataSearch#Data Search Setup (Table).DeleteRec(Boolean)
member.summary: Used for also deleting related records, e.g. for SalesHeader that has several subtypes
